lead_paragraph: GILDIN--David, 95, on June 27, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Lucille. Cherished companion of Cecile Schrader. Devoted father of Beth Gildin Watrous, Marsha Gildin, Janis Gildin and husband Michael Roach. Grandfather of Lauren, Naomi and Heather Watrous, Jahdea and Shalom Gildin, Eyla and Eliani Roach Gildin, Andrew Wagner and Erin Lutes. Dear brother of Leon Gildin. A builder and Boiberikaner. Our one and only. Service Thursday, June 30th, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
